message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it holds significant value that will benefit you greatly.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm confident that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $20,000 is already a competitive offer. To find a middle ground, I'm willing to lower the price to $17,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit far from my target price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $12,000. Can we discuss further?
